channel.title: I need a coder who is legit ---New Post ---
channel.description:
Hello Im tfortacos I am very new to 562 server My friend Mar The owner of the server downloaded a client and source we had trusted other coders before but all dint know wtf they were doing i need a real legit coder here are things that need to be coded :D
-P Ring stats :'/ been trying to fix all night dont work -All Npc's drop Dagnnoth bones? Cant fix either ): -Dagannoth kings need to have corresponding drops 1.The rings they are all mixed up 2.Dagannoth kings are non-agressive and do not hit back when you attack them? -If its not to much to ask for Can you add chaotic models to the source? A working G.e? and Fixed party room?[I will Drop in a 15$ Itunes card if you can do all 3 :D]
And i cant relly pay you in cash but if any one is intrested I can buy a 10$ itunes gift card if you have a itunes account i can give you the Code so basicly im paying you in Itunes Cash Just Leave A comment below if you can do those things once you fix I will buy the itunes card and give you the code ^^; Thank you very much...
-Tfortacos

item.title: I need a coder who is legit ---New Post ---
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requests are not allowed, sorry. Feel free to PM a user though and i’m sure you’ll find one who is willing to help you.

Read full topic

I am very new to 562 server My friend Mar The owner of the server downloaded a client and source
we had trusted other coders before but all dint know wtf they were doing i need a real legit coder
here are things that need to be coded

A working G.e? and Fixed party room?[I will Drop in a 15$ Itunes card if you can do all 3 :D]
